about_the_game:
After the gameplay update of the base game, Spooky Halloween has become more of a fantasy adventure game and less focused on the Roguelite/Hardcore factor, with fewer repetitive and challenging levels. Therefore, the Classic Challenge Mode DLC brings enthusiasts the first version of the game, where enemies and levels are designed to push players to their limits!

Focusing on the "back from the beginning" system and permanent death, the DLC offers more levels and more enemies, significantly increasing the difficulty for players, just like in the early versions of the game.

A horrible Halloween for you! 🎃
